summary: The NPS (National Police Safety Rescue), whose purpose is to catch extreme criminals alive, becomes the center of attention. A sit-in demonstration takes place. Members of the NPS, ... See full summary »

title: S: Saigo no Keikan - Dakkan: Recovery of Our Future
